Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I've only used GenAI to edit text in small amounts (sentences at a time) to suggest alternative/clearer wording, whereas teacher feedback is targeted at the entire assessment and areas to improve/I did well in

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really, they didnt give feedback on the same things so is hard to compare but I find AI is quite general and only useful sometimes, whereas teacher feedback is more personal and the teacher understands the assessment in ways the AI cannot
